name: Cardenas Cortez
review: These guys are unfailingly helpful and friendly. They do good work at a reasonable price. I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Sallie Horn
review: I had a brand of drivetrain on my older road bike that I wanted to rebuild. Even though they don't sell or stock that one, they took it on, and completed the project with great success. I'm one happy camper!

name: Britney Webb
review: Best way to learn more about how to ride effectively. Group meets Tuesday and Thursday nights..

name: Millicent Ratliff
review: Got there at closing time. Not only did I get great, fast, friendly service, but he didn't even want to take my money for the repair!

name: Elvia Kennedy
review: Great shop! Very knowledgeable staff! Best place in the area to get a bike fitting. If you have a problem, these guys will know how to fix it.

name: Simon Madden
review: Stopped in for a simple basket for my wife's neighborhood cruiser. Found great quality basket at a fair price. Very friendly owner. Great shop.
